class.name: com.yougou.dto.zz.Order
class.select: SELECT goods_name,goods_color,order_num,order_msum,users_region,users_address,users_name,users_phone,unorder.users_num,order_id,order_date,stock.goods_size FROM unorder INNER JOIN stock on unorder.stock_id=stock.stock_id INNER JOIN goods ON stock.goods_id=goods.goods_id INNER JOIN address ON unorder.address_id=address.address_id

SELECT goods_name,goods_color,order_num,order_msum,users_region,users_address,users_name,users_phone,dorder.users_num,order_id,order_date,stock.goods_size FROM dorder INNER JOIN stock on dorder.stock_id=stock.stock_id INNER JOIN goods ON stock.goods_id=goods.goods_id INNER JOIN address ON dorder.address_id=address.address_id

SELECT goods_name,goods_color,order_num,order_msum,users_region,users_address,users_name,users_phone,corder.users_num,order_id,order_date,stock.goods_size FROM corder INNER JOIN stock on corder.stock_id=stock.stock_id INNER JOIN goods ON stock.goods_id=goods.goods_id INNER JOIN address ON corder.address_id=address.address_id
